objects.specification: A large flat floor panel with a smooth, neutral light gray matte finish. It has a subtle non-reflective texture providing a clean, unobtrusive base surface ideal for showcasing exhibits and allowing clear visitor flow around the booth.
A tall rectangular wall panel with a crisp white matte surface and slight fine-grained texture. It serves as a backdrop for displays and provides a clean, uniform exhibition boundary.
A vertical side wall with the same smooth white matte texture, offering a neutral surface for mounting large display panels or banners without visual distraction.
A vertical side wall matching the left wall in style and finish, providing symmetry and a bright, understated background for signage and lighting fixtures.
A clean front wall with a white matte finish and minimal texture, completing the enclosure and framing the booth entrance while maintaining visual openness.

A realistic full-scale demonstration car with sleek metallic silver paint, glossy finish, tinted glass windows, detailed front grille, headlights, and textured tire treads. The proportions match a modern sedan, providing an authentic visual centerpiece.

A large rectangular display panel with a smooth glossy red frame and matte white central area for branding. It features a high-resolution printed car logo and key specifications, designed to be eye-level for visitors.
A matching display panel mirroring the left side, with a glossy red border and crisp informational graphics. It highlights brand imagery and vehicle features at comfortable viewing height.

A small rectangular information stand table with a warm orange laminated tabletop, slender metal legs, and a built-in brochure rack. It offers a welcoming spot for attendees to pick up brochures and ask questions.

children.specification: A modern visitor chair with a cushioned orange seat and back, slim black metal frame, and non-slip feet, arranged alongside the table for easy seating.
A matching modern visitor chair with cushioned seat and slim frame, positioned opposite for two-person interaction.

objects.specification: A second information stand identical to the first, with a warm orange tabletop, metal legs, and brochure storage. It provides an additional spot for visitor engagement near the entrance.

children.specification: A visitor chair matching the set, with cushioned orange upholstery and slim frame, placed at the stand for comfortable seating.
A matching guest chair with a comfortable cushioned back and seat, providing seating for two at the second stand.
